_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

StockAvailabilityReport.description: A report on the quantities of each item that are, or will be, in stock. This document is sent by a Seller (for example a producer) to a Buyer (for example a retailer).

StockAvailabilityReport.title: Stock Availability Report. Details
StockAvailabilityReport.description: A report on the quantities of each item that are, or will be, in stock. This document is sent by a Seller (for example a producer) to a Buyer (for example a retailer).

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Stock Availability Report. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Stock Availability Report. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Stock Availability Report. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Stock Availability Report. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Stock Availability Report. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Stock Availability Report. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Stock Availability Report. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Stock Availability Report. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Stock Availability Report. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Note.title: Stock Availability Report. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

DocumentCurrencyCode.title: Stock Availability Report. Document_ Currency Code. Code
DocumentCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the default currency for this document.

InventoryPeriod.title: Stock Availability Report. Inventory_ Period. Period
InventoryPeriod.description: The inventory period covered by the Report.

DocumentReference.title: Stock Availability Report. Document Reference
DocumentReference.description: A reference to another document associated with this document.

Signature.title: Stock Availability Report. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

SellerSupplierParty.title: Stock Availability Report. Seller_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

RetailerCustomerParty.title: Stock Availability Report. Retailer_ Customer Party. Customer Party

InventoryReportingParty.title: Stock Availability Report. Inventory Reporting_ Party. Party
InventoryReportingParty.description: The party that will receive and use the Stock Availability Report (normally the branch for which the stock is reported).

StockAvailabilityReportLine.title: Stock Availability Report. Stock Availability Report Line
StockAvailabilityReportLine.description: A line representing a particular item of sale and associated with a line in the Catalogue.
